title: Mom
synopsis: After her stepdaughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.

title: Bert Kreischer: Secret Time
synopsis: Shirtless comic Bert Kreischer relays personal secrets and stories about being a cool -- if not always responsible -- dad in this stand-up special.

title: On My Skin
synopsis: Arrested in Rome for a drug-related offense, Stefano Cucchi endures a harrowing week in custody that changes his family forever. Based on true events.

title: Barça Dreams
synopsis: Explore the history and philosophies behind one of the world's most beloved -- and successful -- soccer franchises: FC Barcelona.

title: Mad World
synopsis: A stockbroker struggling with bipolar disorder goes to live with his estranged father in a cramped flat, where old resentments bubble to the surface.

title: Mo Amer: The Vagabond
synopsis: Arab-American comedian Mo Amer recounts his life as a refugee comic, from traveling with the name Mohammed to his long path to citizenship.

title: God Knows Where I Am
synopsis: Through diary entries, this documentary follows the life and death of homeless woman Linda Bishop and her struggles with starvation, sanity and God.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
synopsis: Ranging from absurd to profound, these Western vignettes from the Coen brothers follow the adventures of outlaws and settlers on the American frontier.

title: The Gathering
synopsis: Between divorce, bad relationships and coming out as gay, a group of affluent friends realize that none of their lives are as easy as they seem.

title: Bad Seeds
synopsis: Troubled by his past, a scam artist who runs a petty racket with his adoptive mom finds redemption while mentoring a group of difficult students.

title: Four Sisters and a Wedding
synopsis: Four sisters unite to stop their young brother's pending nuptials upon meeting his fiancée’s demanding family, revealing long-simmering family issues.

title: Evening Shadows
synopsis: When her son comes out to her as gay, a religious mother struggles to reconcile his truth with her own beliefs and their orthodox family values.

title: Christopher Robin
synopsis: Now a careworn middle-aged man, Christopher Robin goes on a familiar adventure when his old pal Winnie the Pooh brings him to the Hundred Acre Wood.

title: Jimmy Carr: The Best of Ultimate Gold Greatest Hits
synopsis: Nothing is off limits as Jimmy Carr serves up the most outrageous jokes from his stand-up career in a special that's not for the faint of heart.

title: Lupt
synopsis: Haunted by disturbing visions, a workaholic takes a vacation with his family, but a detour leads them to an unsettling stranger and chilling events.

title: Petta
synopsis: An affable, newly appointed college warden proves to be no ordinary man when an old enemy resurfaces and exposes his complicated, violent past.

title: Petta (Telugu Version)
synopsis: An affable, newly appointed college warden proves to be no ordinary man when an old enemy resurfaces and exposes his complicated, violent past.

title: Uriyadi 2
synopsis: When a chemical plant's poor conditions cause tragedies, an employee leads a protest against the company’s callous owner and local politicians.

title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
synopsis: Sebastian Maniscalco delivers an expressive stand-up at the legendary Beacon Theatre on Whole Foods, family nicknames and dodging obnoxious neighbors.

title: Dolemite Is My Name
synopsis: In 1970s LA, struggling comedian Rudy Ray Moore hits it big with his raunchy alter ego, Dolemite, then risks it all to take his act to the big screen.

title: The King
synopsis: Wayward Prince Hal must turn from carouser to warrior king as he faces hostilities from inside and outside the castle walls in the battle for England.

title: The 24 Hour War
synopsis: An intense rivalry between Henry Ford II of the Ford Motor Company and Enzo Ferrari results in the most epic showdown in racing history.

title: Lorena, Light-Footed Woman
synopsis: Lorena Ramírez of Mexico's Rarámuri community lives a pastoral life -- except when she straps on her sandals to compete as an ultramarathon runner.

title: Dhamaal
synopsis: Tipped off about buried money in Goa, four ne’er-do-well friends go on the hunt, chased by a police officer who wants the treasure for himself.

title: Bazaar
synopsis: A young man challenges traditional customs by standing up to the father of the woman he loves, who has promised her to a wealthy expatriate.

title: Miles Davis: Birth of the Cool
synopsis: Unpack the mythology of Miles Davis and learn the true story of a jazz legend with never-before-seen footage and celebrity interviews.

title: Trixie Mattel: Moving Parts
synopsis: Drag queen Trixie Mattel deals with the bittersweet reality of success in this documentary that explores her rise to fame and subsequent music career.

title: My Stupid Boss
synopsis: After moving to Kuala Lumpur, Diana lands a secretary job at an ironworks owned by her husband's old college friend, possibly the world's worst boss.

title: The Perfect Dictatorship
synopsis: After accepting a colossal bribe, a powerful TV conglomerate gins up fake news stories to enhance the image of a notoriously corrupt politician.

title: Defiance
synopsis: In this action-packed drama based on an extraordinary true story, four brothers protect more than 1,000 Jewish refugees during World War II.

title: E-Team
synopsis: The courageous investigators of Human Rights Watch's Emergencies Team risk their lives to document unlawful attacks on civilians by brutal dictators.

title: Tom Papa Live in New York City
synopsis: Comedian Tom Papa's family-oriented standup special follows in the footsteps of Bill Cosby and Ray Romano as he riffs on the trials of married life.

title: Love Per Square Foot
synopsis: Individually, bank employees Sanjay and Karina don't earn enough to be able to buy a home, so they decide to enter into a marriage of convenience.

title: Soni
synopsis: While fighting crimes against women in Delhi, a short-fused policewoman and her level-headed female boss grapple with gender issues in their own lives.

title: The Patriot
synopsis: A widower and past war hero just wants to live in peace and farm his land -- until a cruel British officer brings the American Revolution to his door.

title: Kung Fu Panda 2
synopsis: When a frightful new enemy emerges, Po and the Furious Five embark on a perilous journey to save China and the art of kung fu.

title: War Horse
synopsis: During World War I, the bond between a young Englishman and his loyal horse, Joey, is tested when Joey is sold to the cavalry and sent to France.

title: Chasing Amy
synopsis: Comic book artist Holden meets the perfect woman, only to learn that she's a lesbian. But that doesn't stop him from falling in love with her.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
synopsis: The crew must protect Zion, the last outpost still under human control, after it is pinpointed by the machines responsible for the Matrix.

title: The Death and Life of Marsha P. Johnson
synopsis: As she fights the tide of violence against trans women, activist Victoria Cruz probes the suspicious 1992 death of her friend Marsha P. Johnson.

title: The Master
synopsis: A heavy-drinking loner finds some semblance of a family when he stumbles onto the ship of Lancaster Dodd, the charismatic leader of a new 'religion.'

title: The Croods
synopsis: When an earthquake obliterates their cave, an unworldly prehistoric family is forced to journey through unfamiliar terrain in search of a new home.

title: Ghost Pain
synopsis: World War IV is over, but a bomb has gone off in Newport City, killing a major arms dealer who may have ties with the mysterious 501 Organization.

title: Ghost Tears
synopsis: As Motoko and Batou attempt to thwart a mysterious terrorist group, Togusa tracks the killer of a man with a prosthetic leg made by Mermaid's Leg.

title: Just Another Love Story
synopsis: When he causes a car accident that leaves a young woman with amnesia, a man finds himself telling incredible lies to make her and her family happy.

title: Kon-Tiki
synopsis: With five loyal friends in tow, explorer Thor Heyerdal sails a fragile balsa wood raft along an ancient path some 4,300 miles across the Pacific.

title: Trailer Park Boys: The Movie
synopsis: In this feature-length adventure, Ricky, Julian and Bubbles -- just out of jail -- plan the lamest scheme yet: to get rich by stealing tons of change.

title: Cutie and the Boxer
synopsis: A 2014 Oscar nominee for Best Documentary Feature, this film explores the symbiotic relationship of artists Ushio and Noriko Shinohara.

title: The Crying Game: Collector's Edition
synopsis: IRA terrorist Fergus bonds with his prisoner, Jody. Jody tells Fergus of his girlfriend, Dil, with whom Fergus later falls in love.

title: Talaash
synopsis: Set in the jumbled landscape of Mumbai, this mystery drama centers on a police inspector who's trying to cope with the collapse of his marriage.

title: The Rainmaker
synopsis: A young attorney and a scrappy paralegal work to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company.

title: Naruto Shippuden the Movie: The Will of Fire
synopsis: When four out of five ninja villages are destroyed, the leader of the one spared tries to find the true culprit and protect his land.

title: The Physician
synopsis: A medical apprentice in 11th-century Persia disguises himself as a Jew to study at a school that does not admit Christians.

title: Love, Rosie
synopsis: Over the years, as they come and go in each other's life, childhood pals Rosie and Alex struggle to resolve the lasting, intimate bond between them.

title: Nathicharami
synopsis: Reeling from the loss of her husband, a widow struggles to fulfill her physical and emotional desires despite social taboos around female sexuality.

title: Keith Richards: Under the Influence
synopsis: In a documentary with unparalleled access, discover the people and sounds that inspired rock 'n' roll legend Keith Richards from childhood to today.

title: Trash
synopsis: Three poor Brazilian teens find something suspicious in a garbage heap, then end up on the run from the law as they try to set things right.

title: Shor In the City
synopsis: When three small-time Mumbai crooks steal a bag on a train, they find that it's filled with weapons and realize that their lives may be in danger.

title: Jalpari: The Desert Mermaid
synopsis: When they travel to their father's ancestral village, city kids expecting a natural paradise instead find a poor, dusty town that harbors secrets.

title: The Real Miyagi
synopsis: A look at the life of karate master Fumio Demura shows how he spread the discipline in the West, winning countless devotees and influencing Hollywood.

title: Jimmy Carr: Funny Business
synopsis: British comedian Jimmy Carr unleashes his deadpan delivery and wickedly funny one-liners to a sold-out audience at the UK's Hammersmith Apollo.

title: Frank and Cindy
synopsis: Frank was a rising pop star when he married Cindy, but decades of dashed dreams and alcoholism have left the pair struggling to find happiness.

title: The Lobster
synopsis: In a near-future world, single people are hunted and forced to find mates within 45 days, or be turned into animals and banished to the wilderness.

title: Beynelmilel
synopsis: When a local musician and his band are forced to perform in honor of a right-wing coup, his daughter schemes to make their music subversive instead.

title: Audrie and Daisy
synopsis: In this wrenching documentary, two teens are sexually assaulted by boys they considered friends, humiliated online and harassed by their communities.

title: Trikal (Past, Present, Future)
synopsis: A Goan native returns to his now-derelict, palatial childhood home, recalling his family’s interpersonal drama during the end of Portuguese rule.

title: Gabriel 'Fluffy' Iglesias: One Show Fits All
synopsis: Gabriel 'Fluffy' Iglesias discusses his teenage son and encounters with Snoop Dogg, Chris Rock and Vicente Fernández in this stand-up special for 2019.

title: Norman Lear: Just Another Version of You
synopsis: This documentary turns the spotlight on the man behind the iconic 'All in the Family,' with comments from friends, family and famous collaborators.

title: Into the Inferno
synopsis: With stunning views of eruptions and lava flows, Werner Herzog captures the raw power of volcanoes and their ties to indigenous spiritual practices.

title: A Family Affair
synopsis: The filmmaker hunts for the missing puzzle pieces of his family history during a visit with a complex and controversial figure: his grandmother.

title: The Siege of Jadotville
synopsis: Besieged by overwhelming enemy forces, Irish soldiers on a U.N. peacekeeping mission in Africa valiantly defend their outpost in this true story.

title: Düğün Dernek
synopsis: On the first day of Ramadan, Ismail joins friends on a road trip to a mosque and encounters his son, who, to Ismail's chagrin, plans a hasty wedding.

title: Norm Macdonald: Hitler's Dog, Gossip and Trickery
synopsis: In this new stand-up special, Norm Macdonald delivers sly, deadpan observations from an older -- and perhaps even wiser -- point of view.

title: Mune: Guardian of the Moon
synopsis: When the old guardian of the moon retires, the mischievous Mune is chosen as his successor, but he worries he's not up to the job.

title: Trevor Noah: Afraid of the Dark
synopsis: The 'Daily Show' host ponders the perils of naming countries, how traffic lights turn New Yorkers invincible and why you shouldn't drink in Scotland.

title: Beyond All Boundaries
synopsis: As the 2011 Cricket World Cup begins, three Indians demonstrate their passion and the sacrifices they've made for the country's most popular sport.

title: Slam
synopsis: Teen father-to-be Sam imagines his future as a young parent and finds a surprising mentor while reading about his idol, pro skateboarder Tony Hawk.

title: Command and Control
synopsis: Chronicling a 1980 Titan II missile accident, this sobering documentary weighs the balance of power and safety involving weapons of mass destruction.

title: Betting on Zero
synopsis: This documentary delves into the complex world of Herbalife, the international nutritional supplement company accused of fostering a pyramid scheme.

title: Krisha
synopsis: After 10 years away from her family, Krisha returns for Thanksgiving, but bitter grudges and troubling addictions threaten to ruin the event.

title: Ho Mann Jahan
synopsis: Three friends in modern-day Karachi navigate their post-college lives, while struggling to balance their passion for music with familial obligations.

title: Steve Jobs
synopsis: By keying in on three crucial points in his career, this biopic shows the human foibles and visionary fearlessness of the man who made the Mac.

title: Bhool Bhulaiyaa
synopsis: Siddharth dismisses warnings that his palace might be haunted, until ghostly occurrences force him to reconsider his beliefs.

title: Ittefaq
synopsis: A homemaker and a writer are prime suspects -- and the only witnesses -- in a double murder, and it’s up to one detective to uncover the elusive truth.

title: First They Killed My Father
synopsis: A 5-year-old girl embarks on a harrowing quest for survival amid the sudden rise and terrifying reign of the Khmer Rouge in Cambodia.

title: Patton Oswalt: Annihilation
synopsis: By turns scathing and candid, Patton Oswalt reflects on the glut of comic material in the Trump era and the dark days following a personal tragedy.

title: Pizza, birra, faso
synopsis: A group of hardscrabble young thieves in Argentina decide to leave their boss and plan heists on their own.

title: Conor McGregor: Notorious
synopsis: From making ends meet to lavish rides and fur coats, the Irish MMA champion grants an all-access pass to the highs -- and lows -- of his ascent.

title: Greater
synopsis: Faith and determination transform a talentless football player at the University of Arkansas into an All-American in this inspiring true story.

title: Waiting
synopsis: While visiting his comatose wife in the hospital, a serene old professor befriends a vibrant young woman whose husband has also fallen into a coma.

title: Sometimes
synopsis: Seven strangers anxiously waiting for their HIV test results decide to bribe the clinic receptionist to get them early, learning one is positive.

title: Carlos Ballarta: Furia Ñera
synopsis: Mexican comic Carlos Ballarta mocks himself and points out the absurdities of parenthood and how he uses his wife's pregnancies to avoid commitments.

title: Chronicle of an Escape
synopsis: Soccer goalie Claudio Tamburrini is kidnapped by the Argentine military. Several months later, he joins other prisoners in planning a daring escape.

title: Eeda
synopsis: Two young adults with families on opposite ends of the political spectrum fall in love in a Kerala city torn by violence.

title: Bangkok Traffic (Love) Story
synopsis: After an encounter with an engineer working the night shift for the city train, a 30-year-old woman struggles against all odds to pursue true love.

title: Trevor Noah: Son of Patricia
synopsis: 'Daily Show' host Trevor Noah touches on tacos, runaway snakes, camping, racism immunity and lessons he learned from his mother in this comedy special.

title: Tahaan
synopsis: After his family's donkey is confiscated by a moneylender, 8-year-old Tahaan travels across conflict-torn Kashmir to find his beloved pet.

title: Love In A Puff
synopsis: When the Hong Kong government enacts a ban on smoking cigarettes indoors, the new law drives hard-core smokers outside, facilitating a meeting between Cherie, a makeup saleswoman, and Jimmy, an advertising exec.

title: Mountain
synopsis: Featuring breathtaking imagery and thought-provoking narration, this film takes viewers to the summits of some of the world’s most amazing mountains.

title: To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before
synopsis: When her secret love letters somehow get mailed to each of her five crushes, Lara Jean finds her quiet high school existence turned upside down.
